item.title: [req] tut vid
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

You want to make forums yet canâ€™t spell?. You do not need a video tutorial for such an easy task. Download the forum software you want phpBB, Smf whatever. Unzip the file. And upload all those folders to your root web directory or another folder. Then read the readme it should tell you to go to a file called setup.php or something like that. Make your MySql Database and fill in the details use in your MySql database and your done. Any questions just ask.

It should ask you to fill in these details:
MySql Username: When you make it you specify it. (to make a mysql database go to your MySql Control panel)
Mysql Password: You specify this when you make it in your control panel. remember all these details must match.
MySql Location/server: It should tell you on the MySql Part of your control panel. eg mysql3.freehostia.com
MySql table: Leave as default.

Read full topic
